components.name: Web GUI
components.description: The user interface that allows users to interact with CapRover for deploying and managing applications.

components.name: API Server
components.description: Handles requests from the Web GUI and communicates with the datastore and Docker services.

components.name: Datastore
components.description: Stores application configurations, user data, and other persistent information required by CapRover.

components.name: Docker Engine
components.description: Manages containerized applications and services, enabling deployment and scaling.

components.name: Nginx
components.description: Acts as a reverse proxy and load balancer for incoming traffic to the deployed applications.

data_flows.description: User actions in the Web GUI trigger API calls to the API Server for application management.
The API Server retrieves and stores application configurations and user data in the Datastore.
The API Server sends commands to the Docker Engine to deploy and manage containers.
Nginx routes incoming traffic to the appropriate Docker containers based on configuration.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between the user and the CapRover system, including the Web GUI and API Server.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting the Datastore from unauthorized access and ensuring data integrity.
